    PsiWhiteSpace(' ')

      PsiElement(()('(')
      PsiElement())(')')

      <empty list>
    PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
    Open block
      PsiElement({)('{')

        Modifiers
          <empty list>
        Type element
          Reference element

        PsiWhiteSpace(' ')

          PsiElement(identifier)('home')

        Reference expression

            PsiElement(identifier)('simplePlugins')
          PsiElement(.)('.')
          PsiElement(identifier)('each')

          PsiElement({)('{')
          PsiWhiteSpace('\n        ')
          Parameter list
            <empty list>

              PsiElement(identifier)('layoutPlugin')

              Reference expression
                PsiElement(identifier)('it')
          PsiElement(new line)('\n    ')
          PsiElement(})('}')

      PsiElement(})('}')

    PsiElement(})('}')
---

  PsiElement(new line)('\n')

      Call expression
        Parenthesized expression
          PsiElement(()('(')

              PsiElement(identifier)('String')

              Reference expression
                PsiElement(identifier)('home')
          PsiElement(new line)('\n    ')
          PsiErrorElement:')' expected, got 'simplePlugins'
